languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains +1 stack of tactical advantage per every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by the Master Tactician or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} получает 1 уровень тактического преимущества за каждые 5 единиц {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}, получаемых самим мастером-тактиком или его союзниками.
В начале боя число уровней тактического преимущества тактика равно <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g} мастера-тактика</u>.

traits.locale_text: Tactician gains 1 stack of Tactical Advantage per every 5 Momentum gained by Tactician or their allies. The Tactitian begins combat with the amount of Tactical Advantage stacks equal to their Fellowship Bonus.

Tactician gains 1 stack of Tactical Advantage per every 5 Momentum gained by Tactician or their allies. The Tactitian begins combat with the amount of Tactical Advantage stacks equal to their Fellowship Bonus.

The Tactician gains 1 stack of Tactical Advantage per every 5 momentum gained by the Tactician or their allies. The Tactician begins combat with the amount of Tactical Advantage stacks equal to their Fellowship bonus.

The Tactician gains 1 stack of Tactical Advantage per every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} gained by the Tactician or their allies. The Tactician begins combat with the amount of Tactical Advantage stacks equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains +1 stack of tactical advantage per every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by the Master Tactician or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text: Тактик получает 1 уровень Тактического преимущества за каждые 5 единиц моментума, получаемых самим тактиком или его союзниками. В начале боя число уровней Тактического преимущества тактика равно {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ тактика.

Тактик получает 1 уровень Тактического преимущества за каждые 5 единиц моментума, получаемых самим тактиком или его союзниками. В начале боя число уровней Тактического преимущества тактика равно {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ тактика.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}或其盟友每获得5点{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，战术专家就会获得1层战术优势。
战术专家在战斗开始获得额外战术优势层数，等同于战术专家的<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains +1 stack of tactical advantage per every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by the Master Tactician or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}或其盟友每获得5点{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，战术专家就会获得1层战术优势。
战术专家在战斗开始获得额外战术优势层数，等同于战术专家的<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} gana 1 acumulación de Ventaja táctica por cada 5 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} obtenido por el maestro táctico o sus aliados.
El maestro táctico empieza el combate con tantas acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica como su <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains +1 stack of tactical advantage per every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by the Master Tactician or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} gana 1 acumulación de Ventaja táctica por cada 5 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} obtenido por el maestro táctico o sus aliados. El maestro táctico empieza el combate con tantas acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica como su {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} erhält +1 Stapel "Taktischer Vorteil" für jeweils 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}, die er von sich selbst oder seinen Verbündeten bekommt.
Der Meistertaktiker beginnt den Kampf mit einer Anzahl Taktischer Vorteil-Stapeln, die seinem <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> entspricht.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains +1 stack of tactical advantage per every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by the Master Tactician or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} erhält 1 Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil pro 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}, die er von sich selbst oder seinen Verbündeten bekommt. Der Meistertaktiker beginnt den Kampf mit einer Anzahl an Taktischer Vorteil-Stapeln, die seinem {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} entspricht.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} bénéficie de 1 cumul d'Avantage tactique par tranche de 5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} que ses alliés ou lui obtiennent.
Le maître tacticien commence le combat avec un nombre de cumuls d'Avantage tactique égal à son <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains +1 stack of tactical advantage per every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by the Master Tactician or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text: Le Tacticien bénéficie de 1 cumul d'Avantage Tactique par tranche de 5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} que ses alliés ou lui acquièrent. Le Tacticien commence le combat avec un nombre de cumuls d'Avantage Tactique égal à son {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}は、自身または味方が獲得した{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}5につき、戦術的優位を+1スタック得る。 戦術の達人は、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}に等しいスタック数の戦術的優位を所持した状態で戦闘を開始する。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains +1 stack of tactical advantage per every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by the Master Tactician or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text: 戦術家は、自身または味方が獲得した{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}5につき、戦術的優位を1スタック得る。 戦術家は、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}に等しいスタック数の戦術的優位を所持した状態で戦闘を開始する。
